ygData.subject: Extra money
ygData.msgSnippet: If you had read the terms of this paid to surf the web program, you would see that you are already in violation of them...
ygData.messageBody:
If you had read the terms of this 'paid to surf the web' program, you would see that you are already in violation of them...

**********************************************
What is your anti-spam policy?
AllAdvantage.com strictly forbids the sending of unsolicited mass emails or spam of any sort, whether via email, Usenet or any other form. The account of any member who uses spamming techniques to solicit referrals will be terminated, and that mailing address will be ineligible for a new account.

What is spamming? Spamming is the unauthorized sending of emails and Usenet messages to people who you do not know personally or have not otherwise agreed to receive your messages. If you are unsure, please only send personal emails to your friends. Nobody appreciates junk email.


***********************************************

quote:

Message: 1
Date: Sun, 09 May 1999 21:38:26 -0700
From: David Robinson <daverobinson@...
Subject: Extra Money

Hey all, I was just sent an email by a friend of mine. He asked me if I
wanted to earn a bit of extra money just for Playing EQ...he said that
it would at least pay for my mothly charge....So I went to the site and
took a peak. I read all the stuff, and it was simple...be on the net,
earn a bit of money. It is that easy, and doesn't cost anything.

So if your interested take a peak
http://www.alladvantage.com/go.asp?refid=BSN894

I just ask that if you do sign up that you either use the link above or
that you make sure you use my id # which is BSN894
you will see why if you read the page

Thanks,
David
aka Heden
